on_entry: /execute as @s[type=hfrlc:backpack_visual] at @s run loot spawn ~ ~1 ~ loot backpack_visual_spawn_egg
/execute as @s[type=hfrlc:backpack_visual_mid] at @s run loot spawn ~ ~1 ~ loot backpack_visual_mid_spawn_egg
/execute as @s[type=hfrlc:backpack_visual_big] at @s run loot spawn ~ ~1 ~ loot backpack_visual_big_spawn_egg
